name: Commit-Boost
description: Commit-Boost is an open-source Ethereum validator sidecar. It standardizes communication between validators and third-party protocols, acting as a light, MEV-Boost compatible platform. This enables validators to safely make commitments, including participating in preconfs to potentially boost yield.

docsIntegration.text: Documentation at https://commit-boost.github.io/commit-boost-client/ with node operator and developer guides
Modular architecture supports mev-commit, Bolt Protocol, Tai-yi, inclusion lists via il-boost. MEV-Boost replacement with per-key relay configuration.
Major operators using it: P2P.org, Stakely, Chorus One. No native token, no airdrop - public good maintained by not-for-profit entity.

notes: No additional hardware needed beyond your validator node.
Enables preconfirmation rewards from modules like mev-commit, Bolt, Espresso.
Installation via binary, Docker, or Kubernetes Helm Chart.
